entry.def: A linguist is someone who is good at speaking or learning foreign languages.

example.ex: Her brother was an accomplished linguist.
example.tran: 她的哥哥能熟练地说好几种语言。

entry.def: A linguist is someone who studies or teaches linguistics.

means.word_mean: 2. a person who speaks more than one language
